|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = 2166 |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *32x8 channel bonding - enables extreme cable Internet speeds *OFDM 2x2 - enables Gigabit Internet speeds Only compatible with ''Xfinity'' from {{Approved by service|Comcast}} ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/11614/netgear-launches-nighthawk-x4s-ac3200-docsis-31-cable-modem-router ''Netgear Launches Nighthawk X4S AC3200 DOCSIS 3.1
Cable Modem Router'' on '''AnandTech'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
